headline: Southern Co. (SO) Registers a Bigger Fall Than the Market: Important Facts to Note
summary: Southern Co. (SO) closed the most recent trading day at $86.27, moving 1.43% from the previous trading session.

headline: Is Southern (SO) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After US$1.75b Equity Units Offering
summary: If you are wondering whether Southern's share price still lines up with what the business is worth, this article is for you. Southern's stock last closed at US$87.52, with returns of 0.4% year to date and 11.5% over the past year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns stand at 37.3% and 79.8% respectively. Recent price moves sit against an ongoing flow of broader market and sector headlines, which often influence how investors think about regulated utilities and income focused names like...
